short_summary: The project aims to engage a Project Leader/Executive (senior) to support the implementation phase of the Future Fighter Capability Project (FFCP) and assist government executives in defining the requirements for the service of F-35A.  This requirement is only open to a specific pre-qualified suppliers who have been previously assessed by the department for accreditation.
description: Lead a cross-functional team to identify operational requirements for the service of F-35AThe key tasks and deliverables for this project are:oversight and coordination of the development of the requirementsthe development of the Service Delivery Plan (SDPSD)boundary setting and accountability for systemization of government intra relationshipsDevelop a milestone-based timeline that outlines the key activities and deadlines for the Service Delivery Plan (SDPSD)",

full_summary:
### Project Leader/Executive - Senior Tender Announcement

**Reference Number:** W8485-TSPS2025-01
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** W8485-TSPS2025-01

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites proposals from pre-qualified suppliers to provide Project Leader/Executive - Senior services under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Supply Arrangement.

**Project Overview:**
The DND seeks one (1) Project Leader/Executive - Senior to support the Future Fighter Capability Project (FFCP) Implementation phase. The successful incumbent will assist government executives in defining the scope, deliverables, and implementation conditions related to the introduction to service of the F-35A.

**Contract Details:**

* Contract duration: Two (2) years, with three (3) irrevocable option years.
* Estimated level of effort: 240 days per year.
* Timeframe: August 1, 2024, to July 31, 2026, plus three (3) irrevocable option years.

**Security Clearance:**
The successful supplier will require an FSC - Secret security clearance.

**Pre-qualified Suppliers:**
Only the following pre-qualified suppliers may submit a proposal:

[List of pre-qualified suppliers, with 208 companies listed, is excluded for brevity]

**Proposal Submission:**
Proposals must be submitted electronically by the specified deadline. Interested suppliers must ensure they have access to the Government Electronic Tendering System.

**Tender Closing Date:** July 5, 2024, at 14:00 Hours Eastern Time.

**Contact Information:**
Khan Check
DND Point of Contact
khan.check2@forces.gc.ca
819-939-5741

**Additional Information:**
A copy of this notice may be accessed on the Government of Canada Tenders and Procurement website. For more information on the TSPS Supply Arrangement, please contact Public Works and Government Services Canada at [spts.tsps@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:spts.tsps@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

Note: The rewritten entry has been formatted in a more professional manner, with concise headings and bullet points. The content has been rephrased to improve clarity and organization.
